heading: Heading
atleast_1_tree_type_required: At least one tree type is required
atleast_1_registration_type_required: At least one registration type is required
invalid_key_error: Field key can only contain letter, numbers and special characters (-, _ and space)
atleast_2_dropdown_option_required: Atleast two dropdown options are required
get_started_forms_description:
• This form helps you to collect additional data for each registration.
• You can customize the form elements based on the tree type i.e. single, multiple or sample.
• You can also customize it based on location of registration, whether it's off-site or on-site.
default_value_only_number: Default value can only be number
get_started_metadata_description:
• Here you can add the data which will be included in all the tree registrations.
• You can specify the access level for each data whether it can be public or private.
import_data_desc: Import data from file exported from TreeMapper
export_data_desc: Export data to make sure your changes are save or share it with others.
export_additional_data_message: JSON file to easily import your TreeMapper additional data into the app in simple clicks.
share_additional_data_error: Not able to share additional data at the moment.
import_file_error: Unable to import file at the moment.
current_additional_data_lost: All your current data in forms and metadata will be lost in order to import new data. This will also affect the incomplete registrations. Are you sure do you want to continue?
incorrect_format_additional_data_import: File format does not match with the required format.
do_you_want_to_delete_page: Do you want to delete page {{pageTitle}}?
import_export_data_desc: You can import from file exported from TreeMapper or you can save your form builder data by exporting it.
importing_additional_data:
Importing additional data for form builder.
This might take some time
no_form_redirect_next_screen:
No form data available.
Redirecting to next screen.
